docs.title: Personal Portfolio Website
docs.description: Create a personal portfolio website to showcase your projects and skills. Include sections for an about me, projects, skills, and contact information.
docs.instructions:
1. Start by designing wireframes and layouts for each section.
  2. Code the HTML structure, adding semantic tags.
  3. Apply CSS styles to make it visually appealing and responsive.
  4. Add JavaScript for interactivity, such as smooth scrolling and hover effects.

docs.title: To-Do List Web App
docs.description: Build a to-do list application with features like adding, editing, and deleting tasks. Make it user-friendly and visually appealing.
docs.instructions:
1. Create a structured HTML layout for the app.
  2. Style it using CSS, focusing on user-friendly design.
  3. Implement JavaScript for task manipulation (adding, editing, deleting).
  4. Add event listeners for user interactions and validation.

docs.title: Weather App
docs.description: Create a weather app that fetches and displays weather information for a user's location, including temperature, humidity, and forecasts.
docs.instructions:
1. Choose a weather API (e.g., OpenWeatherMap).
  2. Build a simple HTML layout for displaying weather information.
  3. Use JavaScript to make API requests and update the UI dynamically.
  4. Add geolocation to automatically detect the user's location.

docs.title: Simple Blog
docs.description: Develop a basic blog platform where users can read and create blog posts. Include features like adding, editing, and deleting posts.
docs.instructions:
1. Create HTML templates for displaying blog posts and forms for creating/editing posts.
  2. Use JavaScript to handle CRUD operations and update the JSON data.
  3. Implement validation and error handling for the forms.

docs.title: Interactive Quiz Game
docs.description: Build a quiz game with multiple-choice questions and a scoring system. Include a timer for each question.
docs.instructions:
1. Design a quiz layout with questions and answer choices.
  2. Use JavaScript to display questions one at a time and handle user responses.
  3. Implement a timer for each question.
  4. Calculate and display the user's score at the end.

docs.title: E-commerce Website
docs.description: Develop an e-commerce platform with product listings, a shopping cart, and checkout functionality. Implement user accounts and order history.
docs.instructions:
1. Create a React app structure with components for product listings, cart, and user profile.
  2. Implement state management for cart items and user authentication.
  3. Add a checkout process with payment processing.

docs.title: Social Media Dashboard
docs.description: Create a social media dashboard that aggregates data from various social platforms (e.g., Twitter, Instagram). Display user metrics, trends, and posts.
docs.instructions:
1. Build React components for each social platform's data.
  2. Fetch data from social media APIs and display it in charts and graphs.
  3. Implement user authentication for accessing personal data.

docs.title: User Authentication System
docs.description: Develop a user authentication system with features like registration, login, password reset, and email verification. Use JWT for token-based authentication.
docs.instructions:
1. Create React forms for registration, login, and password reset.
  2. Implement JWT for secure authentication.
  3. Add frontend validation and error handling for user interactions.

docs.title: Real-time Chat Application
docs.description: Build a chat application that allows users to chat in real-time. Include features like private messaging, typing indicators, and notifications.
docs.instructions:
1. Create a React-based frontend with components for chat rooms and private messages.
  2. Set up a WebSocket server for real-time communication.
  3. Implement user authentication and private messaging features.
  4. Add real-time notifications.

docs.title: Task Management System
docs.description: Develop a task management system with features like task creation, assignment, deadlines, and priority levels. Include a dashboard for tracking tasks.
docs.instructions:
1. Create React components for task lists, task creation, and task details.
  2. Set up a Node.js backend for task storage.
  3. Implement task assignment, deadlines, and priority levels.
  4. Build a dashboard for users to track and manage their tasks.

docs.title: Content Management System (CMS)
docs.description: Create a CMS for managing website content, including articles, images, and user roles. Implement role-based access control (admin, editor, contributor).
docs.instructions:
1. Design a user-friendly admin interface for content management.
  2. Implement user roles and permissions.
  3. Use React for building the frontend and focus on frontend-related tasks.
  4. Add features for creating, editing, and publishing content.

docs.title: E-commerce Platform Enhancement
docs.description: Enhance your e-commerce platform with advanced features like product reviews, recommendations, and payment gateways. Implement user-generated content.
docs.instructions: 1. Add advanced frontend features such as product reviews, recommendations, and user-generated content.

docs.title: Progressive Web App (PWA)
docs.description: Convert an existing web application into a Progressive Web App that works offline. Implement caching strategies for assets and data.
docs.technologies: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React.js, Service Workers
docs.instructions: 1. Focus on frontend tasks such as adding service workers to cache assets, enable offline functionality, and manifest files to make your app installable on users' devices.

docs.title: Data Visualization Dashboard
docs.description: Build a data visualization dashboard that displays real-time data from multiple sources. Include interactive charts and graphs.
docs.instructions:
1. Create interactive frontend components for data visualization.
  2. Display data in real-time using frontend technologies.

docs.title: Full-Stack Blog Platform
docs.description: Create a full-stack blog platform with advanced features like comments, user profiles, and rich text editing. Use Markdown for content formatting.
docs.instructions: 1. Focus on frontend features such as user profiles, comments, and rich text editing using frontend technologies.

docs.title: Machine Learning Integration
docs.description: Integrate machine learning models into your web application to provide personalized recommendations or predictions.
docs.instructions: 1. Integrate machine learning models into the frontend of your web application to provide personalized recommendations or predictions.

docs.title: Blockchain-Based Application
docs.description: Develop a decentralized application (DApp) using blockchain technology for data storage or smart contracts.
docs.instructions: 1. Focus on frontend development for your blockchain-based DApp, including building the user interface using React.js.
